channel.title: CVE Feed for DREAM TRAIN INTERNET INC. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DREAM TRAIN INTERNET INC. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39886|2024-08-02T04:33:10.953Z -- dream%20train%20internet%20inc. -- tone%20store%20app
item.description: TONE store App version 3.4.2 and earlier contains an issue with unprotected primary channel. Since TONE store App communicates with TONE store website in cleartext, a man-in-the-middle attack may allow an attacker to obtain and/or alter communications of the affected App.
